00067 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00068 /// abstract youBot joint parameter which can be read only
00069 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00070 class YouBotJointParameterReadOnly : public JointParameter {
00071 friend class YouBotJoint;
00072   protected:
00073     YouBotJointParameterReadOnly();
00074 
00075 
00076   public:
00077     virtual ~YouBotJointParameterReadOnly();
00078 
00079     virtual void toString(std::string& value);
00080 
00081 
00082   protected:
00083     virtual void getYouBotMailboxMsg(YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& message, TMCLCommandNumber msgType, const YouBotJointStorage& storage) const = 0;
00084 
00085     virtual void setYouBotMailboxMsg(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& message, const YouBotJointStorage& storage) = 0;
00086 
00087     virtual std::string getName() const = 0;
00088 
00089     virtual ::ParameterType getType() const = 0;
00090 
00091     std::string name;
00092 
00093     ::ParameterType parameterType;
00094 
00095 };

00158 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00159 /// Error and Status flags of the joint. 
00160 /// Bit 0: Overcurrent flag. This flag is set if overcurrent limit is exceeded. \n
00161 /// Bit 1: Undervoltage flag. This flag is set if supply voltage to low for motor operation. \n
00162 /// Bit 2: Overvoltage flag. This flag is set if the motor becomes switched off due to overvoltage. \n
00163 /// Bit 3: Overtemperature flag. This flag is set if overtemperature limit is exceeded. \n
00164 /// Bit 4: Motor halted flag. This flag is set if motor has been switched off. \n
00165 /// Bit 5: Hall error flag. This flag is set upon a hall error. \n
00166 /// Bit 6: Encoder error flag. This flag is set upon an encoder error. \n
00167 /// Bit 7: Winding error flag. [currently not used] \n
00168 /// Bit 8: Cycle time violation. [currently not used] \n
00169 /// Bit 9: Initialization error of sine commutation. This flag is set if initialization is failed. \n
00170 /// Bit 10: Position mode flag. This flag is set when the module is in positioning mode. \n
00171 /// Bit 11: Position end flag. This flag becomes set if the motor has been stopped at the end position. \n
00172 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00173 class ErrorAndStatus : public YouBotJointParameterReadOnly {
00174 friend class YouBotJoint;
00175   public:
00176     ErrorAndStatus();
00177 
00178     virtual ~ErrorAndStatus();
00179 
00180     void getParameter(unsigned int& parameter) const;
00181 
00182     void toString(std::string& value);
00183 
00184 
00185   private:
00186     void getYouBotMailboxMsg(YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& message, TMCLCommandNumber msgType, const YouBotJointStorage& storage) const;
00187 
00188     void setYouBotMailboxMsg(const YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg& message, const YouBotJointStorage& storage);
00189 
00190     std::string getName() const {return this->name;};
00191 
00192     ::ParameterType getType() const {return this->parameterType;};
00193 
00194     void parseYouBotErrorFlags() const;
00195 
00196     unsigned int value;
00197 
00198     std::string name;
00199 
00200     ::ParameterType parameterType;
00201 
00202 };
